coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttackHead] Randomly select one of the following effects: Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, or Sinking. Then, inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (5 times max)

[OnSucceedAttackHead] Randomly select one of the following effects: Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, or Sinking. Then, inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (5 times max)

[EnemyKill] Randomly select one of the following effects: 1 Poise Count, 1 Charge Count, 1 Haste, 1 Offense Level Up, or 1 Defense Level Up. Then, apply the selected effect to 2 random allies next turn

[OnSucceedAttack] Randomly select one of the following effects: Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, or Sinking. Then, inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (7 times max)

[EnemyKill] Randomly select one of the following effects: 2 Poise Count, 2 Charge Count, 2 Haste, 2 Offense Level Up, or 2 Defense Level Up. Then, apply the selected effect to 2 random allies next turn

levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. + 1) <sprite name="BoseProjektil"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="BoseProjektil">Разорванные воспоминания</link></u></color> (max 7)
- If it was an A-Reson., gain (highest Reson. +2) <sprite name="BoseProjektil"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="BoseProjektil">Разорванные воспоминания</link></u></color> instead
[BeforeAttack] Gain 1 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> for every <sprite name="BoseProjektil"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="BoseProjektil">Разорванные воспоминания</link></u></color> (max 3)
[EndSkill] Lose every <sprite name="BoseProjektil"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="BoseProjektil">Разорванные воспоминания</link></u></color>

coindescs.desc: +5% Damage on Critical Hit for every <sprite name="BoseProjektil"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="BoseProjektil">Разорванные воспоминания</link></u></color> (max 35%)

levelList.name: Несеммитричная инерция
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson.) <sprite name="Vibration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Vibration">Тремор</link></u></color> Count (max 6, 20 per turn)
- If the said Reson. was a Sloth Reson., trigger <sprite name="Switch_Vibration"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="Switch_Vibration">Преобразование амплитуды</link></u></color> on <sprite name="Vibration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Vibration">Тремор</link></u></color> on self into <sprite name="VibrationSpring"><color=#f8c200><u><link="VibrationSpring">Тремор: Заводной механизм</link></u></color>

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger <sprite name="VibrationExplosion"><color=#e30000><u><link="VibrationExplosion">Провокация Тремора</link></u></color>; then, reduce target's <sprite name="Vibration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Vibration">Тремор</link></u></color> Count by 1
- When triggering Tremor Burst, inflict 1 <sprite name="AmberTakeDamageUp"><color=#e30000><u><link="AmberTakeDamageUp">Уязвимость к Лености</link></u></color> this turn
- If the highest Reson. was a 4+ Sloth A-Reson., inflict 1 <sprite name="AmberTakeDamageUp"><color=#e30000><u><link="AmberTakeDamageUp">Уязвимость к Лености</link></u></color> next turn as well

levelList.name: Несеммитричная инерция
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain (4 + highest Reson.) <sprite name="Vibration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Vibration">Тремор</link></u></color> Count (max <style="highlight">10</style>, 20 per turn)
- If the said Reson. was a Sloth Reson., trigger <sprite name="Switch_Vibration"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="Switch_Vibration">Преобразование амплитуды</link></u></color> on <sprite name="Vibration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Vibration">Тремор</link></u></color> on self into <sprite name="VibrationSpring"><color=#f8c200><u><link="VibrationSpring">Тремор: Заводной механизм</link></u></color>

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Trigger <sprite name="VibrationExplosion"><color=#e30000><u><link="VibrationExplosion">Провокация Тремора</link></u></color>; then, reduce target's <sprite name="Vibration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Vibration">Тремор</link></u></color> Count by 1

[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger <sprite name="VibrationExplosion"><color=#e30000><u><link="VibrationExplosion">Провокация Тремора</link></u></color>; then, reduce target's <sprite name="Vibration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Vibration">Тремор</link></u></color> Count by 1
- When triggering Tremor Burst, inflict 2 <sprite name="AmberTakeDamageUp"><color=#e30000><u><link="AmberTakeDamageUp">Уязвимость к Лености</link></u></color> this turn
- If the highest Reson. was a <style="highlight">3+ Sloth Reson.</style>, inflict 2 <sprite name="AmberTakeDamageUp"><color=#e30000><u><link="AmberTakeDamageUp">Уязвимость к Лености</link></u></color> next turn as well
